report.title: JBC, Reptilewatch L2 sections and refugia
report.description: All sections and refugia for a Reptilewatch L2 site.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false WHERE (#sharing_filter#) AND lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) AND l.deleted=false AND l.parent_id=#parent_id#
